[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@svelte-put/toc](./toc.md) &gt; [TocObserveParameters](./toc.tocobserveparameters.md)

## TocObserveParameters interface

options to config how `toc` action create `IntersectionObserver` for each matching toc element

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TocObserveParameters extends Omit<IntersectionObserverInit, 'threshold'> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Omit&lt;IntersectionObserverInit, 'threshold'&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [enabled](./toc.tocobserveparameters.enabled.md) |  | boolean | whether to add <code>IntersectionObserver</code> to each matching toc element to track active active element in the viewport. default to <code>true</code> |
|  [strategy](./toc.tocobserveparameters.strategy.md) |  | 'parent' \| 'self' \| 'auto' | <p>strategy to observe matching toc elements. default to <code>auto</code></p><p>- <code>'parent'</code> — observe the parent element of the matching toc element</p><p>- <code>'self'</code> — observe the matching toc element itself</p><p>- <code>'auto'</code> — attempt to compare matching toc element &amp; its parent <code>offsetHeight</code> with <code>window.innerHeight</code> to determine the best strategy.</p> |
|  [threshold](./toc.tocobserveparameters.threshold.md) |  | number \| ((element: HTMLElement) =&gt; number) | threshold passed to <code>IntersectionObserver</code>. default to <code>(element) =&gt; Math.min((0.8 * window.innerHeight) / element.offsetHeight, 1)</code> |
